attributes.additional_details: This will mean people aren’t risking drinking back in there cars drunk after nights out . Although we have taxis they are expensive and often deter people from getting home in them . Trains are low price and having them running through out the evening will decrease drunk driving rates .
attributes.background: Increase the amount of trains running through the night . We need more trains available from 8pm-6 am.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for train operating companies and Network Rail.
